duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and build a cloud BI platform including scheduled and ad-hoc reporting, interactive dashboards, and data feeds for internal and external customers.
Collaborate with application development and product teams to migrate existing BI and reporting applications to AWS.
Research, design, and build a business intelligence framework to enable analytics, data science, and reporting across all product lines.
Work on mining and onboarding new data sources into the BI platform and modeling the BI data lake to facilitate data-driven decisions for leaders and clients.
Develop and support large, mission-critical transaction processing applications (preferred qualifications).
Work in a highly regulated financial services environment and understand advanced security concepts including data masking (desired qualifications).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
